segments.text: Have you read the new rules about using cell phone at work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , not bad . Like turn your cell phone ringer off and find a private place to make calls which it ’ s showing your respect to your co-workers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , but for this one , don ’ t bring your cell phone to meetings , I think it is not reasonable . What if there are some important calls ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , this one is not compulsory . It is just suggestion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn ’ t pay attention to that .
segments.speaker: S1
